title: Live Chatting Web-App
description: This chat app is built with many features. You can see the list of users currently present in each room. You can also see the list of all active rooms before joining. Also, the admin has the ability to remove users from an existing room. You also get a notification when someone joins an existing room. ðŸ‘‰ E-mail: demo@gmail.com, Password: 1234

title: Cloud Base Image Recognition System
description: A system that can automatically identify objects in images and provide their corresponding names.

title: Project Management System
description: A system that can collect records of student projects with details and a source code that can facilitate faculty to easily supervise records and arrange them

title: Vaidyatrix Android App.
description: Vaidyatrix is a SaaS Platform for BAMS Doctors that contains in-depth details about patients for better diagnosis and decreased paperwork. all the data is stored in AWS Cloud.

title: Checklist
description: A Todo Web App made with React JS, Redux. It has a login page where users can log in with their Google account. It has a sidebar where users can see all the tasks and can create a new task. It has a calendar where users can see all the tasks on a particular date.
